private.description: Whether posts with this status should be private.

protected.description: Whether posts with this status should be protected.

public.description: Whether posts of this status should be shown in the front end of the site.

queryable.description: Whether posts with this status should be publicly-queryable.

show_in_list.description: Whether to include posts in the edit listing for their post type.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the status.
